comments.body: Some more rules-1. Gambling Currency must not be JET and CANDY. It must be any cryptocurrency available in Coins.game, since the minimum bet is $0.20, better if you play with any stablecoin.2. In case of a draw, both will share the prize. For example, if 2 users hit 1000x, they will share 1st and 2nd prize equally.3. 6th prize, the random winner will be picked from all the participants by this giveaway manager- https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/4. We reserve the right to change any rules, however, only changes that make sense.5. The reward will be paid directly to your Bitcoin address.6. Last submission date- 26th October 23:59:59 UTC.Submit your entry in the below formation-Code:Screenshot of your bet with bet ID:Coins.game Username:Multiplier:Your BTC SegWit address:
